T2: Judgment Day – T-1000 Pointed Hands (Male)

T2 – T-1000 鋭利なハンド（男性用）

kDesc

Morph your hands into sharp points just like the T-1000. Terminator 2: Judgment Day, T2, THE TERMINATOR, ENDOSKELETON, and any depiction of Endoskeleton are trademarks of StudioCanal S.A. All Rights Reserved. ©2012 StudioCanal S.A. ® All Rights Reserved. [#Legal]

Transformez vos mains en pointes, tout comme le T-1000. Terminator 2: Judgment Day, T2, THE TERMINATOR, ENDOSKELETON, and any depiction of Endoskeleton are trademarks of StudioCanal S.A. All Rights Reserved. ©2012 StudioCanal S.A. ® All Rights Reserved. [#Legal]

Verwandle deine Hände in scharfe Spitzen, genau wie der T-1000. Terminator 2: Judgment Day, T2, THE TERMINATOR, ENDOSKELETON, and any depiction of Endoskeleton are trademarks of StudioCanal S.A. All Rights Reserved. ©2012 StudioCanal S.A. ® All Rights Reserved. [#Legal]

Trasforma le tue mani in oggetti appuntiti, proprio come il T-1000. Terminator 2: Judgment Day, T2, THE TERMINATOR, ENDOSKELETON, and any depiction of Endoskeleton are trademarks of StudioCanal S.A. All Rights Reserved. ©2012 StudioCanal S.A. ® All Rights Reserved. [#Legal]

Transforma tus manos en pinchos afilados, como los del T-1000. Terminator 2: Judgment Day, T2, THE TERMINATOR, ENDOSKELETON, and any depiction of Endoskeleton are trademarks of StudioCanal S.A. All Rights Reserved. ©2012 StudioCanal S.A. ® All Rights Reserved. [#Legal]

T-1000のような先端を尖らせたハンドを装備しよう。 \n\nTerminator 2: Judgment Day, T2, THE TERMINATOR, ENDOSKELETON, and any depiction of Endoskeleton are trademarks of StudioCanal S.A. All Rights Reserved. ©2012 StudioCanal S.A. ® All Rights Reserved. [#Legal]

T-1000처럼 당신의 손을 날카롭고 뾰족하게 바꿔보세요. Terminator 2: Judgment Day, T2, THE TERMINATOR, ENDOSKELETON, and any depiction of Endoskeleton are trademarks of StudioCanal S.A. All Rights Reserved. ©2012 StudioCanal S.A. ® All Rights Reserved. [#Legal]

Morph your hands into sharp points just like the T-1000. Terminator 2: Judgment Day, T2, THE TERMINATOR, ENDOSKELETON, and any depiction of Endoskeleton are trademarks of StudioCanal S.A. All Rights Reserved. ©2012 StudioCanal S.A. ® All Rights Reserved. [#Legal]
